home.title: Bringing Ideas to Life Through Code and Design.
home.text: As a passionate full-stack developer, I thrive on transforming ideas into extraordinary web applications. With a keen eye for detail and expertise in web development, I bring visions to life with seamless functionality and stunning design.

about.title: Passion Fuels Purpose!
about.subTitle: Biography
about.text1: Hello, I'm Mauro Dietze, a passionate web developer and UI/UX designer dedicated to crafting beautiful, functional, and user-centered digital experiences. With 4 years of experience in the field, I continuously seek new and innovative ways to bring my clients' visions to life.
about.text2: I believe that design goes beyond aesthetics it's about problem solving and creating intuitive, enjoyable experiences for users. Whether it's a website, mobile app, or any digital product, I bring a commitment to design excellence and user-centered thinking to every project I undertake.
about.text3: I eagerly look forward to the opportunity of applying my skills and passion to your next project, delivering exceptional results that leave a lasting impact.

job1.work: Worked on a team responsible for developing Store-Fornt and integration with Backend for ecommirce.

job2.work: Teaching Office Package, Web page design and develop, AutoCAD, 3D Studio Max, Photoshop, Tango Gestión.

project1.title: Portfolio AP
project1.summary: Personal Portfolio designed for Argentina Programa: Frontend developed with Angular and Bootstrap. As Backend a Rest API built with SpringBoot implementing JWT and the database designed with MySQL Workbench. The whole project was migrated to my own server and built with docker where I use nginx to distribute the requests. Inspiring project where I learned a lot about DevOps and a lot about UX/UI

project2.title: E-Commerce
project2.summary: Front built with Next.js and Tailwind, Back built with Vendure and BD with PostgreSQL
